timeline.message: remove compressed data, change GT to single char

timeline.bodyText: Can you say in the doc here what is excluded since it's not that many fields (NORMX, NORMY, LLR, and BAF)
timeline.author: meganshand

timeline.bodyText: Do you need this default here?
timeline.author: meganshand

timeline.bodyText: Is the diff just being weird or should the code below be deleted since it was moved to createAllelesFromProbeInfo?
timeline.author: meganshand

replies.bodyText:
oh, i need to change createAlleles... back to just new ArrayList.
this version of the methods need to know alleleA and alleleB so there is some duplicate code while we are supporting the legacy mode.
replies.author: ahaessly
